Yes, and I'm not sure there are even engines remaining. Rampage set a 
bomb off in the engine room, didn't he? Or Unitron.

Anyways, those engines are far beyond repair, even with enough spare 
parts.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Stride, the CF has spare parts to replace broken ones.  That 
doesn't mean 
> all of them would work in the Ark.  Also, it just has spare parts 
and scrap, 
> it doesn't have enough to rebuild an entire ship.  You seem to not 
know the 
> amount of damage the Ark has taken intern
